alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 7:11AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN NASSAU AND SOUTHEASTERN CAMDEN COUNTIES THROUGH 800 AM EST... At 710 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Kings Ferry to near Callahan. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Callahan, Kings Bay Base, Yulee, High Point, Dungeness, Cumberland Island, and Harrietts Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
